entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.5°C

Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 70 percent chance of rain or snow or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
